system.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user gains +1 SPATK and EVA stage for 5 activations, and ends their activation. If the weather is New Moon, the user Sets-Up and resolves Lunar Cannon on the same activation.
Resolution: The user resolves and attacks with Lunar Cannon. If there is Sun Weather, Lunar Cannon's Power is reduced by 50%.

actions.name: Lunar Cannon
actions.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user gains +1 SPATK and EVA stage for 5 activations, and ends their activation. If the weather is New Moon, the user Sets-Up and resolves Lunar Cannon on the same activation.
Resolution: The user resolves and attacks with Lunar Cannon. If there is Sun Weather, Lunar Cannon's Power is reduced by 50%.
